email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We are pleased to offer MV SEA HORIZON for your 85,000MT iron ore shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam under CFR terms. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m.

Our starting freight quote is USD 28.50 per metric ton. The laycan is set for October 10-15, 2023.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels, which are around USD 26.50. Can you revise the quote?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

After reviewing the market, we can offer a revised rate of USD 27.25 per metric ton. This is our best offer given the current conditions.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. We are still looking for a rate closer to USD 26.75. Can you match this?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

After further consideration, we can offer a final rate of USD 27.00 per metric ton. This is our best and final offer.

Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Laura,

We accept the final offer of USD 27.00 per metric ton. Please proceed with the contract and send us the recap.

Best regards,
John Doe
